website_summaries.verdict: Perfect choice for cosplayers and sci-fi geeks.
pros: Feels surprisingly good in the hand
Excellent choice for white and Stormtrooper edition cars
cons: Some had to finagle getting the adapters to fit
Reports of dissention from spouses after fitting it

customer_reviews.title: "Cool" Shifter knob...
customer_reviews.text: This "Cool" shifter knob works great on our 2014 Mazda6 (6 speed manual). I think it looks and feels great, but the wife does not think it is cool. I would have preferred a screw-on knob instead of the cheap plastic adapters, but I guess this method makes it work with any shifters. Overall for the money I paid I am happy with my purchase... I wish the Vader version didn't have the ugly swirls in the helmet plus this one was a few dollars cheaper... (I got this as part of a deal for the day). Only had this a few days so I can't comment on how it will hold up over time, but it seems well made.
customer_reviews.author: Todd A. Wegman

customer_reviews.title: Very good stormtrooper gear shift knob! But ...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - The item seems to be from a durable material (I’ve had it for 2 weeks so far) - The adapters are great if your shift knob screw is a different size from the stormtroopers socket. - This comes with 3+ tiny screws that you use and tighten the stormtrooper. Using the alias key that they provide you with Cons: For some reason, no matter how many times I tightly screw in the little screws, somehow, they begin to loosen up which causes the stormtrooper to move left to right a little bit Other than that, very great product and shipping time !
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: There's one; set for stun!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this item! I have a white Toyota Tacoma, with black trim, aka the Stormtrooper Edition. The shifter knob comes with three adapters. Unfortunately, none of them fit my shifter. I went to the hardware store with my stock shifter knob, and found a long bolt that would screw into it. Cost was less than two dollars. Then, I took a hacksaw blade and cut a small groove longways across the last few threads to make a poor man's tap. I used it to rethread the smallest adapter, and it screwed on very well. I used some threadlock for safekeeping. I like the weight of the knob, and it feels very securely attached. And it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: MR

customer_reviews.title: Chipped out of box, bummer, reset screws suck
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box, helmet had chipped paint. Set screws suck, its a novelty, not something you want to ACTUALLY use as a shifter. I have kept in on, maybe someone will steal it and I can replace it with one NOT chipped. Its a conversation piece, NOT a workable shifter in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Trooper
customer_reviews.text: Easy install, but thought the plastic piece would have already been threaded. Not a problem, but was confused for a minute. A lot nicer in the winter when the original shifter was steel.
customer_reviews.author: pretzelguy

customer_reviews.title: I was a disappointed to see the adapters (supplied) that came with the ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item for my 2011 Wrangler. I was a disappointed to see the adapters (supplied) that came with the Shift Knob, didnt fit...genuinely bummed me out. But to my suprise......the shift knob fit perfect without the need for adapters. I just tightened the set screws, and walla, all installed. So it gets minus 1 for its description..it isnt universal ...be warned
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice ceramic almost glassy feel, heavy and durable... this is actually the second knob i bought from this company the first one was darthvader and I've had it for 7 years so I know this company takes pride in product quality! Definitely worth the $$
customer_reviews.author: jessip

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, looks great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, good quality. Made out of metal, it has a better feel than original shifter. Installed it on the 4x4 shifter for a 1996 Isuzu Trooper
customer_reviews.author: dobutsu

customer_reviews.title: Great Star Wars flair for your car.
customer_reviews.text: Great likeness. Sturdy. Biggest issue is that it is not a thread on replacement. There are 3 plastic adaptors (depending on shifter diameter) and 3 set screws. I added some JB Weld to make sure it stays put but the set screws do a good job. (Used the longer of the 2 sets that come with it)
customer_reviews.author: GrubermannPC

customer_reviews.title: No hardware
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't have threading. Have find another way to get it installed. It looks really nice and is durable, but the fact that I have to find other means to install it makes for my lower rating. Had the description mentioned that I would still have purchased it but also purchased the hardware needed
customer_reviews.author: Jediii

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Giving 3 stars cause it was wouldn’t sit tight enough for my liking not horrible looking tho
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, paint is flaking off the top and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, paint is flaking off the top and the screws are striped out. Won't stay on my gear shift. Might have to glue it or just get a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Expected less for the price, but I was surprised it seems like it should’ve been 50 or more for this one.. I’d buy it again and tecommend if you like the style.
customer_reviews.author: joshua

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Loooovvveeee this. So easy to put on. Favorite part of my truck now
customer_reviews.author: Katelynn

customer_reviews.title: Great Cane Topper!
customer_reviews.text: Solid little knobber. Well made and substantial. I recommend. Top your cane with it! If you're handy that is. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Stianazon

customer_reviews.title: I bought a small round billet one for the transmission and I like it way better
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my jeep but it was a bit too big so I put it on the transfer case. I bought a small round billet one for the transmission and I like it way better. Also the set screws mess up the threads a little.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: The handling
customer_reviews.text: Love it fits perfectly And is soooo easy to handle!
customer_reviews.author: José Quiñones

customer_reviews.title: Fits Jeep Tranfer Knob Great
customer_reviews.text: Fit great on my transfer case in my 2010 Jeep Wrangler. Very easy install
customer_reviews.author: BigCat

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Used it in my 91 f150 and it is great doesnt feel cheap and is made good
customer_reviews.author: The Man

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product
customer_reviews.text: This product did not fit like it said it would in the description and is not universal whatsoever
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t come with all the parts.
customer_reviews.text: I think this thing looks awesome. But i didn’t get those three plastic pieces that it says come with it. I have a threaded shifter and this won’t fit without them. So that’s why it got three stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last
customer_reviews.text: Broke 3 weeks after installed so upsetting. My boyfriend loved this and was so upset when it broke
customer_reviews.author: trinity

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: Good size little heave bought it as a gift and my friend loved it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it. Well made. Universal fit as described. Gets a little loose over time.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Connection Fails Quickly
customer_reviews.text: I had been using the knob for 2 weeks when the plastic piece that keeps the knob on the threads of the shifter shaft tore in half in the middle of traffic. The bottom half of the plastic cylinder was stuck on the threads so I had drive the rest of the way home with no shift knob. I has to use a wrench to get the remaining plastic off of the threads just so I could put my old OEM shift knob back on to safely drive again. I would not advise if you plan on using this for a long period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Chevas

customer_reviews.title: Stormtroopers
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, heavy and prefect in our Jeep we named "Stormtroopers"!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen J.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Buy some apoxy with it. The helmet came off within the first week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Need more stars wars head and others movies made shift knobs !
customer_reviews.author: larry t brooks

Retaining screws and Hex key included
